title: RunTime - Node.js
description: PLACEHOLDER

title: Core Logic needs to all be from outlines and unique ids
description:
Refactor needed so that the core functions are not part of the selected index which drives the CLI. They need to only be given the data and the outline number, and return the new data.

The unique ids should always be tracked in and out of each function.

title: Improve: Allow for more demote layers
description: PLACEHOLDER

title: Flat JSON Source of Truth
description: The source of truth for the architecture is a flat json file. The hierarchy is based on a level value, `hier`, which is a int to determine what level the node is in the hierarchy. The ordering is based on the position in the json. The outline numbering is calculated base on the hier and the position.

title: project id
description:
A project id is generated based on the order added in the project. This id remains unchanged inside the project but is not unique across projects. It is used to track items for branches and development in a user friendly way.

The outline number can change so it is not used for branch names, and the unique id is not user friendly. The project id is used to track the item in the project.

title: unique id
description: All items have a generated unique id based on the current date time and a UUID.

title: outline field
description: hierarchical

title: Core Logic
description: Core logic used to manage the flat-hier json file. Used in the CLI, CLI editor and future GUI.

title: BUG: Deleting Last Item
description: When deleting the last item in editor the selected index incremented past the end of the list. This caused an error when trying to add new item.

title: Demote/Promote Item and Children
description: Demote and Promote a item and it's children by outline number. This is used to move items up and down in the hierarchy.

description: Fixes an issue where moving an item past its children causes the selected index to become inconsistent.

description: Fixes an issue where the 'Enter Title' prompt appears above the selected index when adding a new item.

description: Allows users to navigate through items in the hierarchy using the up and down arrow keys.

title: Right/Left Arrows - Demote/Promote
description: Enables users to demote or promote items in the hierarchy using the right or left arrow keys.
